=== U+1 Calendar - April ===
* This is a test to develop a MoinMoinCalendar people can use in their Ubuntu wiki's.
* Current implementation doesn't allow for embedded HTML (iFrame) so we can't directly embed Google Calendar.
* The idea is to have a script/daemon read Google Calendar via RSS, and output the calendar using MoinMoin Syntax formating, as in the example below.
* Talk to me if you want to contribute to this small project: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~Effenberg0x0|Effenberg0x0]]</nowiki>
* Greymech, see if it helps with your plans
* -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:effenberg0x0]]</nowiki> -- <nowiki>[[LaunchpadHome:effenberg0x0]]</nowiki> <<BR>>
